pages.title: Rocket Types
pages.text: AstroExpansion offers three main types of rockets for space travel, each with different capabilities and purposes.$(br2)As you progress through the mod, you'll unlock more advanced spacecraft with improved features, capacity, and fuel efficiency.

pages.title: Probe Rocket
pages.text: The basic unmanned exploration vessel. Probe rockets are single-use devices that collect samples and return with discoveries after 60 seconds. They require a $(thing)Launch Rail$(). Perfect for early-game resource gathering.

pages.title: Personal Rocket
pages.text: A one-way transport vessel for a single astronaut. Personal rockets require a $(thing)Landing Pad$(). You'll need a full $(thing)Space Suit$() to survive the journey. Personal rockets are disposable but essential for your first trip to space.

pages.title: Cargo Shuttle
pages.text: An advanced reusable spacecraft. Cargo shuttles can transport multiple players and items. They require a 3x3 $(thing)Landing Pad$() configuration, and can travel between dimensions. Perfect for establishing supply chains to space stations.
